Test Piece Contest
Magic Flute [unknown arranger]
Show Ground, Scunthorpe Promoted by Scunthorpe British Legion Silver Band. Prizes - 1st £10 and cup, 2nd £7, 3rd £5, 4th £3. March Contest "The Outpost" - 1. Cleethorpes, 2. West Hull 9 bands competed.
